name: Knife (Monoblade)
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d6, Shock 1/AC 15. Can be thrown (Range 10m).

name: Sword/Axe (Monoblade)
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d8+1, Shock 2/AC 13.

name: Heavy Pistol (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d6+2, Mag 12. Takes Projectile Magazines (Heavy Pistol).

name: Assault Rifle (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d8+1, Mag 30. Can Burst Fire (3 ammo for +2 hit/dmg). Takes Projectile Magazines (Assault Rifle).

name: Light Pistol (Laser)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d6+1, Mag 15. Takes Energy Cell (Pistol/Rifle).

name: Laser Rifle
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d10, Mag 30. Takes Energy Cell (Pistol/Rifle).

name: Pump Shotgun (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 2d6, Mag 6. Effective at close range. Takes Projectile Magazines (Shotgun).

name: SMG (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d8, Mag 30. Can Burst Fire. Takes Projectile Magazines (SMG).

name: Magnus Pistol (Energy)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 2d6, Mag 10. Powerful, but loud. Takes Energy Cell (Heavy).

name: Magnus Rifle (Energy)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 3d6, Mag 10. Powerful, heavy. Takes Energy Cell (Heavy).

name: Plasma Rifle (Energy)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 2d8, Mag 10. Deals area damage in small radius. Takes Energy Cell (Heavy).

name: Force Pike
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d8+1, Shock 2/AC 13. Powered melee weapon, requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Vibro-Knife
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d6, Shock 2/AC 15. Small, powered blade.

name: Power Fist
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d12+1, Shock 2/AC 15. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Sniper Rifle (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 2d8, Mag 5. High range, accurate. Takes Projectile Magazines (Sniper).

name: Railgun (Man-portable)
description: Heavy weapon. Dmg 3d10, Mag 1. Slow reload (1 action). Requires Energy Cell (Heavy).

name: Arc Caster
description: Heavy weapon. Dmg 2d6 to all in 10m line. Mag 5. Requires Energy Cell (Heavy).

name: Burst Pistol (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d6, Mag 20. Can fire 3-round bursts (3 ammo for +2 hit/dmg).

name: Burst Rifle (Projectile)
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 1d8, Mag 40. Can fire 5-round bursts (5 ammo for +3 hit/dmg).

name: Stun Baton
description: Melee weapon. Dmg 1d4 (non-lethal). Target makes Con save or is Suppressed for 1 round.

name: Combat Shotgun
description: Ranged weapon. Dmg 2d6, Mag 8. Can Burst Fire. Takes Projectile Magazines (Shotgun).

name: Flamer
description: Heavy weapon. Dmg 2d8, Range 30/50. Requires fuel canister. Area of effect.

name: Armored Undersuit
description: Light armor. AC 13. Can be worn under normal clothing.

name: Combat Vest
description: Medium armor. AC 14. Covers torso, provides basic protection.

name: Combat Hardsuit
description: Heavy armor. AC 15. Full body protection for military personnel. Enc 2.

name: Riot Armor
description: Heavy armor. AC 16. Bulky, specialized for crowd control. Enc 2. Imposes -1 Dex penalty.

name: Powered Armor (Basic)
description: Heavy armor. AC 17. Requires Power Pack (Heavy) for full mobility. Enc 2. Grants +1 Str while active.

name: Hardlight Armor
description: Medium armor. AC 16. Lightweight, uses a projected energy field for defense. Requires Energy Cell (Heavy). Enc 1.

name: Armored Clothing
description: Light armor. AC 12. Appears as normal clothing but offers minimal protection.

name: Force Field Emitter (Personal)
description: Fitted to armor. Grants +1 AC against energy weapons. Requires Energy Cell (Pistol/Rifle).

name: Basic Tool Kit
description: Contains common hand tools for minor repairs and maintenance. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) for routine tasks.

name: Engineer's Tool Kit
description: Comprehensive set of tools for complex mechanical and electrical repairs. Grants +2 to Fix (Int) for advanced repairs.

name: Medkit (Advanced)
description: Full medical trauma kit. Provides 1d6 healing per use. Grants +2 to Heal (Wis) checks.

name: Datapad
description: Standard electronic device for data storage and basic computing. Capacity 1TB.

name: Commpad
description: Standard personal communication device. Range 100km (local area).

name: Universal Translator
description: Translates most known languages (written and spoken) with 90% accuracy. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Hand Scanner
description: Basic multi-spectral scanner for identifying materials, energy signatures, and basic life signs. Range 5m.

name: Welding Torch (Portable)
description: Handheld torch for cutting or joining metal. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Multi-Tool
description: Compact tool with various functions: knife, screwdriver, pliers, wire cutter. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) for simple tasks.

name: Lock Breaker (Hydraulic)
description: Heavy-duty hydraulic tool for forcing open locks and non-reinforced doors. Loud. Enc 1.

name: Grav Belt
description: Personal anti-gravity unit for limited flight (10m/round) in zero-g or low-g. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Climber's Kit
description: Contains durable ropes, rappelling gear, and anchors for secure climbing. Grants +1 to Exert (Str) climbing checks.

name: Personal Field Generator
description: Creates a small, personal energy field (AC 12, 3 HP) around the user for 1d6 rounds. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Stealth Field Generator (Personal)
description: Creates a personal visual distortion field. Grants +2 to Sneak (Dex) checks. Requires Power Pack (High-Cap).

name: Survey Kit (Geological)
description: Tools for basic geological analysis, mapping, and core sampling. Grants +1 to Know (Int) for geology.

name: Environ-Suit
description: Sealed suit for hazardous environments (vacuum, toxic atmosphere). 8 hours of life support. Enc 1.

name: Respirator
description: Protects against airborne toxins and particulates. Filters last 8 hours.

name: Geiger Counter
description: Detects radiation levels. Range 10m.

name: Bio-Scanner
description: Detects life signs and basic biological anomalies. Range 10m. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Chem-Analyzer
description: Identifies chemical compounds in samples. Grants +1 to Know (Int) for chemistry.

name: Data Tablet
description: Larger version of Datapad, with better display and processing power. Capacity 5TB.

name: Portable Computer
description: Full-function portable computer for hacking, data analysis, and complex calculations. Requires Power Pack (High-Cap).

name: Repair Drone (Miniature)
description: Small, programmable drone for minor, automated repairs. Can provide +1 to Fix (Int) for self-repair or simple tasks. Enc 1.

name: Survival Shelter (Collapsible)
description: Lightweight, deployable shelter for 2 people. Provides basic environmental protection. Enc 1.

name: Water Reclaimer (Personal)
description: Filters and purifies water from various non-potable sources. Produces 1 liter/hour. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Flashlight (Heavy Duty)
description: Powerful, long-lasting flashlight. Range 50m. Waterproof and shockproof.

name: Optical Imager (Handheld)
description: High-resolution digital camera with zoom and various filters (thermal, UV). Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Data Chip Reader
description: Reads various data chip formats and allows transfer to a datapad. Basic encryption bypass.

name: Explosives Kit (Basic)
description: Contains basic primers, detonators, and flexible plastic explosive for 3 small charges. Grants +1 to Know (Int) for demolitions.

name: Surveillance Bug (Disposable)
description: Small, adhesive bug for audio/visual surveillance. Range 50m. Battery lasts 24 hours. Stealthy (DC 10 Notice to spot).

name: Encrypted Commpad
description: Commpad with military-grade encryption. Hard to trace or intercept. Range 100km (local area).

name: Handheld Computer
description: More powerful than a datapad, with basic hacking tools. Grants +1 to Program (Int) for simple hacks.

name: Universal Link Cable
description: Connects various electronic devices for data transfer or power sharing.

name: Signal Booster (Personal)
description: Extends commpad range by 50% (e.g., to 150km). Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Holo-Projector (Portable)
description: Projects a detailed, static 3D image or short animation (up to 10m). Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Digital Camera
description: Standard digital camera with zoom and internal storage.

name: Motion Tracker
description: Detects movement (organic and mechanical) through walls up to 10m. Beeps. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Thermal Goggles
description: Provides thermal vision. Grants +1 to Notice (Wis) in darkness or smoke. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Night Vision Goggles
description: Amplifies ambient light for vision in near-total darkness. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Mini-Drone (Recon)
description: Small, silent drone for aerial reconnaissance (Range 1km, 30 min battery). Transmits video to commpad. Easily destroyed.

name: Omni-Sensor
description: Advanced handheld sensor for comprehensive environmental and biological analysis. Grants +2 to Scan (Int). Requires Power Pack (High-Cap).

name: Sniffer (Chemical)
description: Detects airborne chemical compounds and gas leaks. Grants +1 to Notice (Wis) for chemical detection.

name: Utility Belt
description: Modular belt with pouches and holsters for carrying small gear. Enc 0.

name: Backpack (Standard)
description: Standard backpack for carrying gear. Capacity for 2 Encumbrance.

name: Portable Recharger
description: Can recharge small energy cells (pistol/rifle) or power packs (standard). Requires access to power source.

name: Personal Defense Drone
description: Small, automated drone. AC 10, 1 HP. Armed with a minor stunner (Dmg 1d4 non-lethal). Requires Power Pack (High-Cap).

name: Omni-Lash
description: Powered whip-like weapon/tool. Dmg 1d4 (melee), can grab or manipulate objects (Str/Dex checks). Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Survival Knife (Fixed Blade)
description: Rugged, multi-purpose knife. Dmg 1d4 (melee).

name: Backpack (Heavy Duty)
description: Large backpack for carrying significant gear. Capacity for 3 Encumbrance. Enc 1.

name: Cargo Hauler (Personal)
description: Small, wheeled, automated cargo unit. Can carry up to 5 Encumbrance. Slow. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Personal Jetpack
description: Allows short bursts of flight (10m/round) in atmosphere. Requires specialized fuel cells (100cr each). Enc 1.

name: Datajack (Cyberware)
description: Implanted port for direct neural interface with computers. Grants +1 to Program (Int) when using connected devices.

name: Optic Implants (Basic) (Cyberware)
description: Replaces eyes with synthetic implants. Grants basic low-light vision and minor zoom (x2).

name: Subdermal Armor (Cyberware)
description: Implanted armor plates. Grants +1 AC (does not stack with worn armor AC).

name: Neural Interface Port (Cyberware)
description: Implanted port for direct neural control of vehicles/drones. Grants +1 to Piloting (Dex) for connected vehicles.

name: Cybernetic Arm (Basic) (Cyberware)
description: Replaces a limb. Grants +1 to Exert (Str) checks for lifting/crushing. (May require Fix (Int) for maintenance).

name: Comms Implant (Cyberware)
description: Integrated comms directly linked to user's auditory system. Allows hands-free communication.

name: Psion-Suppression Collar
description: When active, suppresses all psionic abilities of the wearer (Con save to resist initial application). Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Pre-Scream Data Chip (Blank)
description: An ancient, highly durable data chip from before the Scream. High storage capacity, potential for advanced encryption. Can be used for sensitive data storage.

name: Xenotech Tool Kit
description: Specialized tools for analyzing and repairing alien technology. Grants +2 to Fix (Int) or Know (Int) for Xenotech.

name: Grav-Boots
description: Allows user to walk on walls/ceilings or reduce weight for short periods. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Personal Cloaking Device (Limited Use)
description: Renders user mostly invisible (DC 12 Notice to spot) for 1d4 rounds. Single use per Power Pack (High-Cap) charge.

name: Portable Field Disrupter
description: Temporarily disrupts energy fields (force fields, energy barriers) in a 5m radius for 1d4 rounds (DC 10 Program to resist). Requires Power Pack (Heavy).

name: Psionic Amplifier (Personal)
description: Enhances psionic powers. Grants +1 bonus to Sense (Wis) or Command (Cha) psionic skill checks. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Quantum Datapad
description: Advanced datapad with immense storage and processing power, capable of complex calculations and breaking advanced encryption. Capacity 100TB.

name: Laser Mic
description: Can pick up audio from reflective surfaces up to 100m away. Requires Power Pack (Standard).

name: Hypo-Injector (Refillable)
description: Administers liquid compounds (stims, antitox) instantly. Can be refilled with compatible substances. Allows faster use in combat.

name: Locksmith Kit (Advanced)
description: Comprehensive set of tools for bypassing complex mechanical and electronic locks. Grants +2 to Fix (Int) checks for locks.

name: Sonic Screwdriver (Multi-tool)
description: Versatile tool that can manipulate various electronic and mechanical devices through sonic vibrations. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) or Program (Int) for non-combat tasks.

name: Universal Access Keycard (Limited)
description: A single-use keycard that can bypass a single high-level security lock (DC 12 Program check to use). Has a 50% chance to trigger a silent alarm. Breaks after use.
